column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If this review was about the pizza alone
column2: it would be a 5-star review without a doubt.  However
column3: I sadly have to dock Lou Malnati's 1-star due to their service.  It was my first time in Chicago and since I had limited time out here due to business
column4: I decided to hit up all the touristy areas first.  My friend that lives in Chicago recommended Lou Malnati's for the best deep dish pizza in town
column5: so I decided to head out here on a Wednesday night.
